entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Buttons without enough padding are truncated in certain scenarios #24746
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Apps compiled for 15.0 / 35 default displaying as Edge to Edge #24742
  • Unable to select tab after backing out of page and returning #24741
    Backlog
  • .NET 9: Runtime crashes when utilizing legacy libraries. #24740
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [iOS] Indicator view does not render properly at load time within the indicator template. #24739
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Notification Service Extension Not Working in TestFlight Release Build #24737
    Backlog
  • [Unstable][MAUI][NET8]Recipe names are truncated on recipe pages #24735
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer ButtonMask always return 0. #24734
    Backlog
  • [Android] Cannot open MainActivity via Intent when the app is in the background #24733
    Backlog
  • [Windows] System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException raised when changing the items source for Indicator view with DateTemplate #24732
    Backlog
  • Remove excessive API docs in comments #24731
    Backlog
  • Pack `HybridWebView` associated JS script as an embedded resource quite like `BlazorWebView` JS script #24730
    .NET 10 Planning

Closed

  • XAML error is shown when the content of a DataTemplate is not a View #22485
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Essentials] Browser.OpenAsync with BrowserLaunchMode.SystemPreferred causes StackOverflowException in .NET for iOS app (non-MAUI app) #24720
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst: Tooltips are not working properly #24671
  • Page Scrolls Up When Clicking Entry Positioned at Bottom #24723
  • UnauthorizedAccessException while accessing file using FileStream in Android #24346
  • Erro ao Criar um projeto com o .NET MUI APP #24291
  • Warnings when including a Converter in XAML #24736
  • Crash on startup with iOS Release #24618
    Backlog
  • Undefined symbols for architecture arm64 Error, while using Native libraries in MAUI iOS #24536
  • Talkback is not announcing Recipes as Headings: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Screen reader. #22968
    .NET 8 SR9
  • DeviceIdiom detects notebook as tablet #24596

PullRequests

Created

  • [HybridWebView] fix trimmer warnings on Android #24744
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Merged

  • Update to Version 8.0.99 #24728
  • 8.0.90 Release Branding #24727
  • Revert "[X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match (#22056)" #24693
    area-xaml

Updated

  • Add styling and Shell to Blazor Hybrid template #24253
    area-templates
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24691
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • [Windows] Add `WindowsBatchPropertyMapper` to save unnecessary work when initializing views #24417
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨, area-keyboard
  • Use newer default backup rules for android #24391
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
    area-infrastructure
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • [Localization] Remove check not allowing translations to run on net9.0 #24724
    area-localization
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Create PlatformElementFactory to ElementHandler #24704
    area-architecture, community ✨
